Description: NL -> Cypher preview with cost/row estimates, sandbox run, diff vs manual query; >=95% syntactic validity on test corpus. Repo: plugins/nlq-copilot/. Plugin self-registers; can be disabled independently.
Acceptance Criteria: Plugin self-registers; can be disabled independently. 95% syntactic validity; zero write queries allowed. Screenshots + snapshot tests check UI determinism.

Summary: NLQ-1: Side-panel UI via module federation
Description: Implement side-panel UI using module federation; no core UI edits required.
Acceptance Criteria: Side panel renders correctly; integrates via module federation; no core UI changes.

Description: Implement /nlq/compile service: prompt -> {cypher, estimates, safety}. Read-only queries only.
Acceptance Criteria: Given NL prompt -> valid Cypher + non-empty estimate. Write queries rejected. Estimates include row/cost.

Description: Show provenance snippets; block publish without citations.
Acceptance Criteria: Citation missing -> blocked with rationale. Provenance snippets displayed for each result.

Summary: NLQ-4: Explain this view extension point
Description: Wire 'Explain this view' extension point for integration with other UI components.
Acceptance Criteria: Extension point callable from other views; returns explanation data.

Description: Create test corpus and pass@k evaluation; regression harness for syntactic validity.
Acceptance Criteria: Corpus covers common queries; pass@k metrics tracked; regression harness runs in CI.

Summary: NLQ-6: Undo/redo and diff against baseline
Description: Implement undo/redo functionality and diff view against baseline queries.
Acceptance Criteria: Undo/redo works for query history; diff view shows AST/plan differences.
